short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you search through the web with a colourful background and a search bar in every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search the internet with colourful new tab.

Enjoy your search experience. The Tabland extension will configure your default search and new tab to Tabland.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing 'Tabland' -  Chrome extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms Of Use and Privacy Policy.

Privacy Policy: https://www.tabland.co/privacy-policy
EULA: https://www.tabland.co/eula

The extension will update your new tab settings and will change your search to be powered by Microsoft Bing.
